channel.description: Recent content in Tape on JDBlog

item.title: Atari XL tape preservation and autopsy
item.description: My first-ever computer was the Atari 600XL with an Atari 1010 Datasette. Recently I stumbled upon some old cassette tapes, one of which I used with my Atari (while the others were utilized with my Sharp MZ-800, which I will cover in a later story). Let’s see if I can recover the data from the tape after such a long time… Some of my old, heavily used, cassette tapes Cassette tape inlay with tape counter positions of the individual programs My plan is as follows: 1.
